thread.title: 'The Situation' enlists new attorney for tax fraud case
thread.title_full: 'The Situation' enlists new attorney for tax fraud case

title: 'The Situation' enlists new attorney for tax fraud case
text: > Top News 'The Situation' enlists new attorney for tax fraud case FILE - In this Sept. 24, 2014 file photo, reporters gather around Mike "The Situation" Sorrentino as he leaves the MLK Jr. Federal Courthouse in after a court appearance in Newark, N.J. Sorrentino has a new attorney for his federal tax fraud case. Newark lawyer Henry Klingeman says Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, he’s “looking forward to helping (Sorrentino) and the court move the case forward.” (AP Photo/Julio Cortez, File)
